value.title: Explore data storage and processing in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore Azure services for performing data analytics, and explore the features of Azure Synapse Analytics.

images.title: Explore data storage and processing in Azure

value.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in customer service
value.excerpt: A successful AI strategy in customer service must consider cultural issues, as well as business issues. The goal of this module is to enable you to think about AI transformation holistically, with a focus on the cultural changes necessary to make AI transformation successful.

images.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in customer service

value.title: Host your domain on Azure DNS
value.excerpt: Create a DNS zone for your domain name. Create DNS records to map the URL to an IP address. Test that the domain name resolves to your web server.

images.title: Host your domain on Azure DNS

value.title: Improve the performance of an API by adding a caching policy in Azure API Management
value.excerpt:
API Management policies are configurable modules that you can add to APIs to change
their behaviors. Policies can do things like cache responses, transform documents and values,
call webhooks for notification or audit purposes, and retry requests after transient
failures. This module will use policies to enable caching in order to improve API performance
under load.

images.title: Improve the performance of an API by adding a caching policy in Azure API Management

value.title: Instrument server-side web application code with Application Insights
value.excerpt: Obtain comprehensive diagnostic information from a web app by adding the Application Insights SDK to your server-side code.

images.title: Instrument server-side web application code with Application Insights

value.title: Introduction to high-performance computing (HPC) on Azure
value.excerpt: Discover the services available on Azure for your high-performance computing workloads.

images.title: Introduction to high-performance computing (HPC) on Azure

value.title: Introduction to Kubernetes
value.excerpt: Determine the types of business problems that can be solved using Kubernetes. Describe the benefits of container orchestration with features like deployment management, automatic updates, and self-healing.

images.title: Introduction to Kubernetes

value.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage
value.excerpt: Learn how Azure Data Lake Storage provides a cloud storage service that is highly available, secure, durable, scalable, and redundant and brings new efficiencies to processing big data analytics workloads.

images.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage

value.title: Embrace Zero Trust with Microsoft 365
value.excerpt: Learn about the Zero Trust model and how to implement Zero Trust into your organization.

value.title: Manage secrets in your server apps with Azure Key Vault
value.excerpt: Your application requires service passwords, connection strings, and other secret configuration values to do its job. Storing and handling secret values is risky, and every usage introduces the possibility of leakage. Azure Key Vault, in combination with managed identities for Azure resources, enables your Azure web app to access secret configuration values easily and securely without needing to store any secrets in your source control or configuration.

images.title: Manage secrets in your server apps with Azure Key Vault

value.title: Manage site reliability
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage site reliability.

images.title: Manage site reliability

value.title: Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure
value.excerpt: This module covers the basics of how to use the Cloud Adoption Framework—a set of documentation, implementation guidance, best practices, and tools that aid in aligning the strategy for business, people, and technology.

images.title: Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure

value.title: Optimize the performance of Azure Cosmos DB by using partitioning and indexing strategies
value.excerpt: Learn how to measure the throughput of your NoSQL database and assess the impact of partition key and indexing strategies on throughput.

images.title: Optimize the performance of Azure Cosmos DB by using partitioning and indexing strategies

value.title: Monitor, diagnose, and troubleshoot your Azure storage
value.excerpt: Discover the tools available to detect and correct problems with your Azure Storage to enable your cloud storage infrastructure to operate at peak performance.

images.title: Monitor, diagnose, and troubleshoot your Azure storage

value.title: Work with files and directories in a Node.js app
value.excerpt: Build an app that manipulates files and directories with Node.js.

value.title: Predict flight delays by creating a machine learning model in Python
value.excerpt: Import airline arrival data into a Jupyter notebook and use Pandas to clean it. Then, build a machine learning model with Scikit-Learn and use Matplotlib to visualize output.

images.title: Predict flight delays by creating a machine learning model in Python

value.title: Protect your APIs on Azure API Management
value.excerpt: Protect your back-end APIs from information exposure and implement throttling to prevent resource exhaustion with policies in Azure API Management.

images.title: Protect your APIs on Azure API Management

value.title: Protect data in-transit and at rest
value.excerpt: Protect data in-transit and at rest

value.title: Deploying machine learning models with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to register and deploy ML models with the Azure Machine Learning service.

images.title: Deploying machine learning models with Azure Machine Learning

value.title: Create a chat bot to help students learn with Azure Bot Service
value.excerpt: Learn how to build a simple bot called GeoFriend, to help students learn the basics of geography. This module covers the principles of responsible conversational AI and how to make bots that a user can trust and enjoy speaking to. Our bot will help school children to learn more about geography and answer some questions, and also learn some study techniques!

images.title: Create a chat bot to help students learn with Azure Bot Service

value.title: Route and process data automatically using Logic Apps
value.excerpt: Define a workflow using built-in triggers, actions, and conditional operators. Your workflow will run automatically when data is available, process the data in the cloud, record results in a database, and send email notifications.

images.title: Route and process data automatically using Logic Apps

value.title: Run nonfunctional tests in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Run automated load tests by using Apache JMeter, a form of nonfunctional testing, in Azure Pipelines.

images.title: Run nonfunctional tests in Azure Pipelines

value.title: Secure an ASP.NET Core web app with the Identity framework
value.excerpt: Add authentication and authorization to an ASP.NET Core web app using the Identity framework.

images.title: Secure an ASP.NET Core web app with the Identity framework

value.title: Store and access graph data in Azure Cosmos DB with the Graph API
value.excerpt: Create an application that that uses an Azure Cosmos DB as a graph database. Store, retrieve and manipulate graph data and visualize it using Data Explorer.

images.title: Store and access graph data in Azure Cosmos DB with the Graph API

value.title: Troubleshoot inbound network connectivity for Azure Load Balancer
value.excerpt: Review multidimensional metrics for the load balancer in Azure Monitor Metrics, and check health probe status for the load balancer.

images.title: Troubleshoot inbound network connectivity for Azure Load Balancer

value.title: Use unsupervised learning to analyze unlabeled data
value.excerpt: Use unsupervised learning methods to predict groupings in data. Use variations of k-means clustering and spectral clustering to analyze and visualize difficult data sets.

images.title: Use unsupervised learning to analyze unlabeled data

value.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage
value.excerpt: Learn various ways to upload data to Data Lake Storage Gen 2. Upload data through the Azure portal, Azure Storage Explorer, or .NET. Or copy the data in Azure Data Factory.

images.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage

value.title: Automate your deployments with Azure DevOps learning path
value.excerpt: Learn how to combine automation techniques such as infrastructure as code with automated pipelines to provision and configure the infrastructure you need to run your applications and services.

topItems.title: Provision infrastructure in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Learn how infrastructure as code enables you to describe and automatically provision the infrastructure that you need for your application.

topItems.title: Configure infrastructure in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Run configuration management tools in Azure Pipelines to help keep your infrastructure configured as you need.

images.title: Configure infrastructure in Azure Pipelines

topItems.title: Provision databases in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to automatically provision Azure SQL Database in Azure Pipelines by using an Azure Resource Manager template.

images.title: Provision databases in Azure Pipelines
Configure infrastructure in Azure Pipelines

value.title: Automate your deployments with Azure DevOps
value.excerpt: Learn how to combine automation techniques such as infrastructure as code with automated pipelines to provision and configure the infrastructure you need to run your applications and services.

topItems.title: Provision infrastructure in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Learn how infrastructure as code enables you to describe and automatically provision the infrastructure that you need for your application.

topItems.title: Configure infrastructure in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Run configuration management tools in Azure Pipelines to help keep your infrastructure configured as you need.

images.title: Configure infrastructure in Azure Pipelines

topItems.title: Provision databases in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to automatically provision Azure SQL Database in Azure Pipelines by using an Azure Resource Manager template.

images.title: Provision databases in Azure Pipelines
Configure infrastructure in Azure Pipelines

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore non-relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn the fundamentals of database concepts in a cloud environment, get basic skilling in cloud data services, and build your foundational knowledge of cloud data services within Microsoft Azure. You will explore non-relational data offerings, provisioning and deploying non-relational databases, and non-relational data stores with Microsoft Azure.

topItems.title: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Azure Table Storage, Azure Blob Storage, Azure File Storage, and Azure Cosmos DB, and explore situations for using them.

images.title: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure

topItems.title: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to provision and configure Azure Cosmos DB, Azure Data Lake , Azure Blob Storage, and Azure File Storage.

images.title: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure

topItems.title: Manage non-relational data stores in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to upload and retrieve data held in Azure Cosmos DB, Azure Blob storage, and Azure File storage.

images.title: Manage non-relational data stores in Azure
Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure
